Doral.Barbara Goleman High School:
Barbara Goleman Senior High School is a secondary school located at 14100 NW 89th Ave in Miami Lakes, Florida; its principal is Joaquin Hernandez. Goleman is part of Miami-Dade County Public Schools Region I, and is school number 7751.
The school is named after Barbara Goleman, the 1969 National Teacher of the Year and the only Miami-Dade County Public School teacher to receive this title.
